alert.note: Alert for Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 04 at 5:49PM CDT until October 04 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN WILBARGER AND BAYLOR COUNTIES... At 549 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Lake Kemp to 3 miles south of Seymour to 4 miles southeast of Bomarton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Seymour, Red Springs, Lake Kemp, Mabelle, Lake Diversion, Westover, and Bomarton. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: These storms are producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
